question:
Write a letter to your new employer. In your letter

• explain your situation
• describe your problems
• tell him/her when you think you can start
text: Am writing this letter in regards to postponing my joining for the position of Assistant Manager in your organization for a week.As I got diagnosed with corona positive the day before yesterday.

I was advised to have rest for a couple of days by the doctor as am having a high fever. Moreover, I feel stiffness in my legs which makes me hard to move from one place to another. Furthermore, am sure you are aware of this illness  spread instantly and can affect other staff members in the company too.

I am feeling much much better today I believe the medicine recommended by my doctor working well. In addition, I have already booked my Covid19 retest for this coming Monday hopefully by then my condition become much better and I would be able to join the office  then.
I hope you will understand my situation and will change my joining date.
